reviews: I bought a 2XL so that I could wear it as a dress (I'm 5'5 105 pounds) and it goes to the perfect length on me - Just slightly above my middle finger when my arms are down at my side. When you wear the sweater with a belt, it does become a lot shorter so I do need to wear shorts underneath if i want to do that. The arms are quite baggy but its not a bad look. Overall I LOVE the sweater as it is exactly what I was looking for!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Really Great for Those on a Budget
reviews: I bought this shirt to wear under my hoodie for the upcoming cold Canadian Winter, and it's quite nice. The color is authentic to whichever you select, in my case it was dark green because I enjoy looking like a pre-ripened olive. I put it through the washer and dryer on high before putting it on, and it fits well. There is Elastic on the Wrists and Waist, and I think that is quite important if you're trying to keep the cold out. It is a bit thin for a sweater by my standards, but it's not meant to be a heavy sweater. Combine with other Hanes sweaters and hoodies like I did, and you can make a Super Sweater! Take that winter!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews:
LOVE this sweater !! Exactly what I was looking for.
Ordered an XL for a comfy fit and it’s perfect.
For the price, the material is better than expected!! The inside is incredibly soft.
No downsides, perfect sweater!

For reference, I’m about 5’9”
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: LOVE THESE SWEATERS! They pair so well with leggings and a jacket for school in the fall and winter. You can wear them at home or out to school when you don’t feel like dressing up. I am a 5”6 female and bought the large for a more comfortable fit so I could roll up the sleeves. These sweaters are extremely soft, very good price, and have tons of color variety! Love them!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Looking for a replacement for damaged product
reviews: Generally these are awesome but my green one’s stitching in the collar started falling apart immediately. I don’t like leaving a bad review but don’t know how to contact the seller. Hoping they will contact me to issue a replacement.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: The arms are fine but the length of the body barely gets down ...
reviews: I normally wear a 2xlt but when tall sizes aren't available I will buy a 4XL which fits me well in the length and arms but not in this case. The arms are fine but the length of the body barely gets down to my belt. They should really indicate the dimensions for this product and not just the size because apparently no two companies make a 4XL in the same dimensions.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Buy 1 or 2 sizes up depending on desired fit
reviews: This sweatshirt is just as pictured however it RUNS SMALL. I am normally a size small but I ordered a medium for a comfy fit, unfortunately it wasn’t as baggy as I had hoped. Otherwise the quality is decent.. not overly thick but soft on the inside.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Good Product, Same as ordered, I really like it. It arrived on exact date. When you are washing it I will suggest you to was in warm water, and individually, and taking its inner part outside, otherwise its outer part can mess up. Overall, they are still very colorful and good.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I'm a woman, 5'3 around 110lbs, bought this sweater in Small in a few neutrals/colours to go with my patterned pants/leggings and whatnot. perfect slightly oversized fit to tuck in, roll up sleeves, layer with jackets or whatever. Great value for the price, a few threads on the inside/near seams that needed to be trimmed but everything is sewn well and looks great.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Sweatshirt fits great as is soft and comfortable
reviews: Colour is true. Sweatshirt fits great as is soft and comfortable. Only wish it was a few inches longer.Overall thought it is very good and I will purchase more. I'm 5'10. Sleeve length is fine. Longer torso would improve it.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Very well finished, great colour, great price. The one I received had deep vertical creases on the front and back, but I'm assuming these will disappear after a few washings. After all, it's just a sweatshirt.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Comfy/Good Value/Thinner material but still fleece-lined/Perf for Spring
reviews: It says for men but don't shy away from buying this as a woman. If you want the casual/wear-with-leggings/boyfriend sweater fit then consider sizing up. I bought M in this sweater just because of my preference but I got other colours in size L and the difference in fit isn't massive - mostly length. Note that the sweatshirt material is thinner than maybe the typical cotton with fleece lining sweatshirt you have in mind. No complaints however, it's still warm and fleece-lined like the traditional Hanes sweaters and as a girl I appreciate the thinner material since it doesn't bunch up at the shoulders and make me look boxier than normal (like some men's sweatshirts can) Perfect for spring weather and super comfy. Recommended :)
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Good Quality but Fits on the Small Side
reviews:
I normally buy Fruit of the Loom Sweat Shirts but thought I'd give this one a try when it was on sale.

The material is good quality and I like the tag-less design. I did find the Hanes Sweat Shirt is more form fitting or smaller than the Fruit of the Loom Sweat Shirt of the same size. Fruit of the Loom is looser fitting and has more arm room than the Hanes.

Overall I like this Sweatshirt however I prefer the slightly larger looser fitting Fruit of the Loom sweatshirt compared to the Hanes. I mostly use sweatshirts for layering at work, hence the looser fit.

I personally would not buy this sweatshirt again however it is good quality and if you like form fitting clothes or are on the skinnier or thinner side of the scale ... this Hanes Sweatshirt might be perfect for you.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Love these sweaters and great price
reviews:
I am happy with these sweaters. They aren’t heavy making them great for layering in this temperamental spring weather. I buy them in large for a cozy oversized look. These sweaters are a wardrobe staple for me now. I wear them to work, I wear them on my days off, and sometimes I wear them as my pyjamas. My boyfriend also likes them.
I usually only buy clothes in boring colours like black and dark blue (also have purchased this sweater in those colours) and I’m glad I went for the adventurous light blue.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews:
I ordered XL. Good value here, nice product, soft and well made. I ordered for myself because I wanted a very oversized sweatshirt just to hang out in. I'm 5'5" 142 lbs, I ended up giving them to my husband because they were a tad boxy on me and didn't cover my bum. My husband is a L and they fit him perfectly. I will advise to wash before wearing as the fluff inside will transfer to clothing underneath.
Colour is true to the pics on the ad, the green is quite nice.
I would go up just one size for fit.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Nice price! Good for women too.
reviews:
Good quality, especially for the price!!!
I typically wear women's size small so expected this to be a bit loose - however, its slightly less loose than expected, so someone who is a men's size small might want to get a medium.
I definitely prefer this style to women's crew neck styles.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Fits small, tight cuffs, will shrink a half size
reviews:
I ordered for the price, just looking for some comfy sweaters to wear at home. You get what you pay for, they're well put together. The cuffs are quite tight and it's very fitted. It fits well as a medium but when I wash it I expect it will be too small to wear after. Nice colors, the fabric is starchy but soft inside. Order a size up if you like a more comfortable, looser fit.

I've noticed that in the left cuff of these sweaters (I ordered three in different colors, same size) there's some bunched up thread or something that irritates my left wrist. It just constantly rubs and rubs on the same small spot but I can't seem to locate exactly where on the cuff the irritant is. Somewhere along the seam. It's the same in all three sweaters, and you can't push or roll up the sleeves because the cuff is too tight.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: feels comfortable fit, not snug/restricting, but relaxed fit . colour is true to what is illustrated, material is light in weight/fabric/weave, not a heavy winter material. delivery good before expected date. even with national postal strike, arrived with UPS.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweatshirts...let's just say my husband was skeptical. I mean, for only $13 how can they be any good, right? Well he loves them! We initially purchased one and tried it; he loved it so we got 3 more! They are just a smidge short but they are surprisingly warm for such a lightweight sweatshirt. My husband is a mechanic and is often out in the cold working. He was impressed. Try them - you won't be disappointed!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews:
I ordered a size up so when I washed and dried it the size would be perfect. I am an xl but I ordered xxl. They are 50% cotton so they will shrink a bit when washed.
I love them. They are so warm and soft. I wanted them to be a bit bigger than regular fit because I'm using them as a second layer at night so I spend less money trying to warm my house in the winter.
The price is really good. The arms and neck arnt tight like the other brand "G" I last ordered. Haynes is very comfortable and I'm glad I bought them. Great prices.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Thin for a sweatshit, but a good cozy thin!
reviews: I bought this for the gym, just a baggy sweatshirt for warming up and keeping muscles warm at the start of my workout. i am a woman 5"2 150lbs. I ordered a Medium, I think i will order a Large or Extra Large next time though! cuffs on the wrist are a little tight, and I am looking for something slightly baggier/longer to go over my leggings or to cozy around the house/errands. I really like that its not a super heavy sweatshirt material, its thin, but still warm and a little soft/fuzzy inside. I think if youre a guy, size up too as the wrists are very very small! Defnitely ordering a few more of these for the price they are definitely worth it and a new winter/gym staple in my closet!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I love this sweater. I am a female and usually wear a medium but purchased this sweater in hopes of having a large comfy sweater for around the house. This is it! I wear it to bed, around the house and sometimes even out and about. I plan on getting one in every colour for these cold winter days. It is very, very comfortable.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: This is exactly what my grandson was looking for. It is reasonably priced, warm and comfortable to wear. It arrived on the day expected. I ordered three at the time and each fits well. We have washed them with no problems. It was put through the dryer by mistake once, but did not shrink (we usually hang sweaters to dry). Love the array of color choices. We are very happy with the quality. Excellent buy for the money.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: While your top was fit as expected, the same is not true for the pants. Have purchased several pairs over the years as I exercise 5 days a week. The older version pants legs were much slimmer. I still have a couple of them I use. I had the pair of pants modified, cost $20.00 but that okay. I like the quality, not too heavy and thick. Will purchase again.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Disappointed, and unable to contact seller
reviews: I bought this sweater to tie dye. When I first got took it out of the packaging, it started turning everything black! There was so much black pigment in it, I had to wash it twice before I did anything to it. After I dyed it, I noticed that the seams were poorly lined up...like, not even close! I couldn’t tell when it was all black, but now that it’s lighter, it’s painfully obvious. Sizing is just okay for a men’s sweater. Incredibly wide and short. Overall pretty disappointed, but you get what you pay for. I’ll go with Gildan next time.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: i read a lot of reviews before deciding to purchase this. i knew it wasn't going to be the lululemon sweater i have been dreaming of but it really did not do anything for me at all. i ended up giving it to my daughter for a lounge, scrub sweater. the inside lining is quite soft, the color is nice, but the fit is ... wonky and kind of boxy. the neck is too small and feels constricting and the arms are bulky. my daughter loves it, i am not a huge fan, but it was only $13 so it was a small gamble.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Probably going to buy this in every colour
reviews: This has quickly become my favourite sweater. I love big baggy sweaters so I ordered it intentionally much too large. It is super cute, super warm, and I've actually received a ton of compliments on it - only to brag about how good of a deal I got it for on here. I bought another one in light blue shortly after buying the navy one, and will probably buy it in every other colour at some point. Definitely doesn't need to be a male-gendered sweater.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I bought the XL sweater to begin with for lounging around.. when it arrived I was NOT disappointed. Very lightweight, good quality material. I bought a Large also to see if it would be better fitting for me considering that's the size I would normally order, but if you want an oversized - napping sweater I suggest to size up! I have bought 5 more of these sweaters in every colour available in the XL. YES YES YES.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: The first thing you will probably notice when wearing this is that you feel like you're being hugged.... all day long.... & its not a person..... by the end of the day you'll want to change into something lighter...... & less huggy.......
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I bought this to print a design on for a group trip. I am a female, I bought a large so it would be extra baggy (I would probably normally wear a men's medium). It was huge width wise, but super short in the torso. Doesn't make much sense as I would assume most men would be longer than I in the torso area. It worked for what I needed it to, just wish it had been longer in the torso.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Its exactly what you think it is
reviews:
very happy with these, have ordered 4 now in different colors.

They do shrink a bit after first wash.

I am 6 foot 1 and 230lbs and have ordered both in xl and xxl. I would say both fit me in different ways - the xl fit great before being washed but was a snug fit after wash. I’ve tended to go for the xxl more so because I am wearing them casually and prefer the loose fit, but the xl is probably a cleaner look if you were going out in public.

xxl could be like an inch longer to be perfect but is sufficiently long.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: This sweater is so soft and cozy. The quality is amazing for the price. I am 5”7 and 120 lbs (with long limbs). I ordered a small and it fit my long arms perfectly. I ordered two in different colours and they both fit great. The colours are so vibrant and look like the photos. I will be ordering more colours soon. I noticed the inside of the sweater did shed on my tank top a bit but not a big deal for me.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I am a woman, 5ft5 and 145lbs. I am usually a woman's M. I ordered a men's M because I wanted something that would be a bit too big for me so it would be more comfortable. This sweater fits me the same as a woman's M. There isn't even much extra room in the shoulders. Also the inside is not as fluffy as one would expect a sweater like this to be.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I love this sweatshirt. The elastic used around the neck and waist stays tight even after several washes. It’s comfortable to wear and not too tight. It washes well in the machine. I’m on the heavy side and usually find sweatshirts and shirts tight around my stomach even when I order XXL, but this fits great. I actually ordered another one.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I am 5'10, 160 pounds and went for mens M. This size is usually a bit loose on me, which I like, but this sweater fit more like a true women's M. It still had a little extra room but it did not feel like a true men's size. The cuffs were also quite tight for this size. Material was much thinner than I expected but still cost, more like a fall sweater.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Not exactly what I wanted but still love!
reviews: Overall this is a great sweater, especially for the price! It feels rough when first out of the package but after one wash it made the world of difference (it’s now my go to comfy sweater)! I was hoping buying this in an XL would make it long enough for a dress where I can wear just spandex shorts underneath, I’m not a tall person-5”2 and it hits just at my crotch, covering half my butt. Considering I’m a female buying 3+sizes larger than I need, I don’t even want to know how it fits on the proper sized person. That being said, I might try a larger size, or buy another and crop it! Overall great sweater for the price!!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Nice sweatshirt for the money, my only complaint is the sleeves are some what tight and being for a male I would not recommend to anyone that is slightly overweight. I am not a big person and the sleeves are quite tight on my arms. I prefer it to have a little more room. Good quality, just smaller than expected
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Good Color, Looks Cool with Jeans
reviews: Overall it is a good purchase but for me due to my measurements, it I expected lengthy From hand. But it is ok size. Moreover, having elastic, it has started getting loose from that part after a wash. Color is Good. Looks good with jeans. I bought it when it was trending item and Just bought this as it was eco friendly and it is still money worth purchase if your measurements are suitable
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I will be mainly wearing these at the gym and it's nice knowing I can have one every day of the week for cheap. I ordered 3 black ones and am very satisfied so I am probably going to order about 7 more. I have a feeling they won't do too well in the dryer so I will be hang drying them as I do with most of my clothes.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Can't beat the price and quality!
reviews: Great price and great quality! I am a 5'4" female and generally fit in female XS. Ordered several sweatshirts in S and they fit well! A little baggy but that was expected and what I prefer with sweatshirts. Own 3 and plan on getting more colours!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews:
Very beautiful vibrant royal blue - true to picture of color shown here on amazon.
Size is as expected. I ordered an XL to wear with leggings and it is a true XL. It is very soft comfy and so far no issues laundering. Shrunk a little bit after the first wash. I'm very pleased with it overall and bought a black one also.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Very comfortable and affordable. Reminds me of the blank sweaters from H&M but actually alittle nicer and cheaper. I’m a medium normally but in a Large it fits comfortably and loose. These sweaters are also thinner than an average sweater which I like since they are casual wear without breaking a sweat. Overall great purchase.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: when i first unpacked this i hated it and wanted to return it immediately, but it was so cheap i washed it anyways and it's now my favourite sweater. i love that the neck is smaller than usual, nice fitted crewneck look without the usual gaping crewnecks have since i'm a female wearing super oversized mens xl sweaters. really surprised and happy with the quality. i have worn this every day and wash once or twice a week and it's completely intact and looks like new still. no loose threads and no holes. it's thin and don't expect it to keep you warm on cold days but it's soft and cozy and cheap af
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I’m very impressed with this sweater! Good value for what it is. It’s comfy! Based on reviews I went with a size large. I usually wear a women’s medium. I wanted to achieve a baggy oversized look and it’s exactly what I wanted! I feel like I might order a medium for a more smaller fitted look as well.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: cant complain for a 13$ sweater its 90% what i expected, it did however fit a little smaller than i thought like after a few washes it might not be to how i like it anymore, im 5'10 145 lbs and i got an XL i like my stuff a bit over sized comfyyy style, i will probably order again in a few months and get XXL
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Its best feature is the price
reviews: Since it's very inexpensive, I can't be terribly hard on it. But it is very thin, and the body is very short. Far too short to be comfortable in most situations. I suppose for really thin people the fit would be perfectly fine, but for anyone carrying weight it is not all that good at all.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I love this sweater, I can't comment on the size expectations because I purposely bought mine too big, I'd probably wear a small and I bought an XL, because sometimes you just want clothing that isn't snug and allows for some room to be my bloated self. That being said, this sweater is warm, soft, comfortable and washes well.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt
reviews: THe red is so much nicer and brighter than photo (like a bright X-mas red) - wich is what I was looking for. I was particularly surprised about the quality when I opened it (figures at this price I might be okay) - it's really a nicer quality than what I ever expected. Recommend.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Oops, I ordered an XL thinking the sizing would be too small, and I wanted it roomy anyway, but it was TOO big (I'm 5"7, 155 lbs). It stuck out on the bottom. I gave it to my fiancee, a burly mechanic. It fits him perfect. So I re-ordered in L. It should be more better. The product is still fine, just the sizing is North American vs Asian
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I bought this sweat shirt for my husband for Christmas. My husband is quite tall so I had to order this 2xlarge size since the first original one had sleeves too short and the body was too short but this one is perfect! He likes the dark maroon colour. It’s comfortable and warm, and it’s Hanes! Can’t go wrong with that!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: The purchase is good, The sizing is a bit off I found it a bit small for my liking, the material is soft but not as soft as other sweaters in this price range. I have purchased these sweaters before and know what to expect, if you are searching for a casual shirt for cheap I would recommend this as a purchase.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I love these tops. I have bought six of them in different colors; and I'm going to order three more. They are good quality for a good price. I ordered some Hanes pants to match some of them so I should get alot of wear out of them. I ordered them to be a bit loose and they fit perfectly.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews:
Really comfortable and good material. It will keep you warm for autumn season. The only thing that bothers me is the size. I'm 6 feet, 195 lbs and I usually wear a little more baggy (XL). So I ordered an XXL so that shrinkage wouldn't br a problem. Turns out that it's a tad small for the length when I received it.

So if you're debating on two sizes, go for the larger one. Other than that, the product looks exactly like described!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Very Nice, ended up buying three..
reviews: These are lighter weight than most, but still warm. The 50/50 cotton poly blend washes up nicely, I set my dryer to damp dry and hang them. They take very little dryer time compared to a T shirt. I prefer wearing layers, these work out very well. Great value.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Good quality, held up after 2 washes. Soft and warm. The 5x is actually, at best, a 3x; and better for short people than tall as the neck to waist length is short for the size. Obliviously made for / by small people and not a typical north american / european.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: These sweats are nicely cut and feel good, but as others have said, they are a little on the short side. I washed inside out in cold water and there was no shrinkage but the length barely covers my belt line. Add 2" to length and they would be perfect.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Very comfy, runs fitted in size.
reviews:
Its a great sweatshirt. Comfy, nice robust material, and very warm.

However, the fit is definitely on the slimmer side. I am 5'7 and it fits perfectly with very little extra room. Almost like the shirt was tailored to me.

So if you want a baggie fit, go a size up at least.

Also, the cuffs are quite snug, so it you dont like that style of sleeve fit, look elsewhere.

Otherwise, a well fitted, very comfy sweatshirt. I will be purchasing more!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Great purchase! Sweatshirt is soft and cozy , definitely worth the price. I had no issues with loose threads or tears ( read other reviews having the product defected) would definitely recommend . For size reference: I am 5'8 140lbs (very gangly lol) I got the medium and it fits roomy, arm and body length is perfect .
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I bought this sweater (two actually) because of the price. I’d say, if you’re in need of something to wear around the house they’re fine, but these sweaters shrink a lot! Before you wash then they seem to be perfect. I really wanted to like these, but the fact that they change in sizing so much after one wash is just upsetting. Good value for what you pay though.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Nice sweater for the price dont put in dryer hang dry instead
reviews: I found that it shrunk up and its too big for me once i put it in the dryer it shrank up but its still a 2xl just too big for me now. The colors faded after the dryer which sucked it stsyed for a long time red and the size was good until i shrank it.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: I use it as a dress sweater
reviews: I am 5'2" and I bought the XL in dark green to wear it as a dress sweater. Sadly, it's still a bit short and I can't raise my arms up in the air and remain decent, so I wear it with some biker shorts instead. Besides this, great quality and very comfortable - the sweater looks exactly as on the pictures! Love it!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I’ve got a long body and it came down to my belt line which was nice but don't be waving your hands in the air like you just don't care. Also don't be the person who puts there arms over your friends shoulders, choose behind the back instead.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Product Material is not as good. It has a strange bad smell to it
reviews: Product Material is not as good. It has a strange bad smell to it. Fits well tho. Also the product came without a tag, not sure if they always come like this. I threw mine into the laundry as soon as I received it because of the smell. but you cant expect too much for such a cheap price.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I bought one of these sweaters and liked it so much that I had to buy two more. They are very comfortable and the simplicity of them makes them fashionable I find. The neck on these are great unlike most inexpensive clothing. They sleeves are also a good length. These are great for just casual wearing and going to the gym on cold winter days.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Excellent shirt at an affordable price
reviews: The quality is excellent! I usually wear size S but I chose size M since I expected it will give me more room for the inner shirt. So, it actually did. The color is exactly like you can see in the picture. I ordered 4 of them for the fall, but I think I can use it as an inner layer for this coming winter since it is really warm and light. With the price, I indeed recommend this shirt to anyone looking for a good quality shirt at an affordable price.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Light and cozy! (Go a few sizes up!)
reviews: I'm a small but ordered a large to have an oversized kinda feel and it's great (I embroidered winnie the pooh on it and it's my fav oversized sweater)! A great light but cozy cottage/summer campfire sweater! It might shrink in the dryer so I'm probably going to hang it to dry but it's definitely worth it for the price
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Color and quality are better than expected
reviews: This was a great purchase, especially for the price. Its not too heavy, but great for a spring sweater. I would point out that the sleeves are a bit wide on the forearms and biceps. Not overly baggy, just not fitted and tight to the arm, if thats whats expected and desired.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: The quality of the sweater is very poor. I have bought Hanes sweaters in the past ...
reviews: The quality of the sweater is very poor. I have bought Hanes sweaters in the past but they weren't like this sweater I ordered. The outer material is rough though the inside is soft. Also, the outer material had lint balls like when you have used and washed clothing.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I only rated 'somewhat small' because I thought it was going to be a bit bigger. I am a girl who usually wears large but mostly medium and I thought a male small would fit but it us just a little bit on the smaller side. Will still wear it though, it's great, comfy and soft.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I have a few Hanes hoodies that I have ordered from Amazon, so i figured I would try out their crew neck sweaters as well. No complaints. Fits great. No unexpected shrinking. My arms are longer that the average person and these sweater still fit well.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: This sweatshirt is the worst quality I have ever had. I washed it once and it pilled so badly, I can't even shave it enough to be able to wear it. Terrible product.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I’ve ordered this before and it’s not the same as my other ones ... a bit disappointed to be honest not really wanting to order more just in case there the same as this one ? It’s not as cozy as the other ones I’ve ordered
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Quality fabric. Nice and plain. Highly recommended.
reviews:
Quality fabric. Nice and plain. I bought small size even though my usual is medium -- small fits my purpose -- I use it as inner layer to parka/jacket when it's too cold outside.

Light Steel, Stonewashed Green and Light Blue are good colors. I would stay away from dark colors as they might be lint-magnet.

All in all, Highly recommended.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Nice and cosy sweatshirt. Good for cold winters and night time camping.
reviews: Getting ready for another cold winter. I have other sweatshirts but they are not warm enough. These were nice and heavy and very good quality. I would recommend these shirts but they run just a little big. I like them that way.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Great value for a wardrobe staple
reviews: Awesome product! Fits perfectly and is really soft and comfortable. For the price they are a steal if you’re looking for a basic sweater. Colours are vibrant. I have the black and the deep green and they are very nice!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Hard to find these plain sweatshirts
reviews: You would think something so simple would be easy to find, but they aren't. Either they have a hood, or they have some sort of print or embellishment. These are just basic old fashioned sweatshirts and it's a great price. Bought many for husbands work shirts when the weather gets cool. Highly recommend. Maybe order one size up for comfort.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Sooooo cozy, and soft. So far I have washed twice and has held up nicer than a more expensive sweater in the same style. I will definitely be purchasing more come fall, and winter for using under a windbreaker.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I bought this in black XL or L i believe...i just like having over sized hoodies and sweatshirts. great value for the price, nothing fancy but its still pretty well made considering it only costs a little over $10...would repurchase. thanks.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Awful... you pay for what you get
reviews: This sweater was ten dollars and not even worth that. I really dont know why people are saying is great. the neck is too small and the entire sweater is mis-shapen.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: This quality of the sweater was nice, and colour was great. I had read some reviews and others had said that the sweaters run small, WORNG. The sweaters run true to size, so i ended up a lot of sweaters that were too big. Thankfully the return process was easy.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: LOVE this sweater.. I have two in different colors. I'd recommend washing prior to first use as it was a bit itchy but fits nicely. Also don't put in dryer as it shrinks in length. Will be buying again in the future.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I got two of these, both the same size. A black one and a steel gray one. The black one is wonderful but the steel gray one idk what happened.... it looks like it was chopped in half and resembles more of a crop top.... not what I ordered and was definitely confused upon receiving. May keep it but I may send it back, not sure..... not exactly the crop top kind of person. They both fit fine and have wonderful material but one is just chopped off halfway.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Sweat shirt de qualité et au comfort indéniable
reviews: Sweat shirt de qualité et au comfort indéniable. Côté style on repassera mais en tant que vêtement d'intérieur, il favorise un effet douillet que je recommande à tous.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: This is a perfect casual item! The size is what the size says it is, at least it was in my case. I like it! I has purchased the black one first, and liked it so much, I got a blue coloured one next... It is a quality sweatshirt which will last a while, i think.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews:
i originally bought a blue pair of sweat pants to go with two blue sweat shirts i had but one is too worn out because it was a handmedown. i'm lad amazon exists because i replaced the shirt i lost with two new ones in case the other shirt gives me problems. thank you amazon, these new shirts
are great.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: This sweater is made of some flimsy material that not only immediately shrunk after first wash, but constantly shrivels up when you wear it. Terrible purchase wish i could still return
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Super comfy, great price, great fit
reviews: I wear high end sweatshirts all the time but I needed some cheap ones to wear around the house that I wouldn't care about ruining. I'm so happy I got this, it's super soft and comfy, i like to get the men's in size small since i'm into the oversized sweatshirt look paired with bike shorts. It is literally the perfect fit, i'm 5'7, 125 lbs and it hits 3/4 down my butt with a slightly baggy silhouette so it's perfect to wear with leggings or bike shorts! Great price, i'll be ordering more for sure!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: He finds it comfortable and soft
reviews: My husband was looking for a basic, crew-neck sweatshirt that didn't come down to his knees. This was surprisingly hard to find- until Hanes. The material is on the thinner side, but that works perfectly for my husband. He finds it comfortable and soft, without being bulky. The item was delivered on time and didn't cost an arm and a leg. We are very pleased!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: For $13 I don’t know how people have complaints
reviews:
I bought a few of these for Christmas presents and one for myself. I got two sizes up for myself because I wanted a huge sweater to lounge in and it’s perfect. I got my boyfriend a large (his size) and it fits him really well, he also loves it and wears it almost every other day since he got it so I’ll be buying him and myself more colours.
5 stars because I cannot think of a single complaint for the price (have washed mine 3 times and haven’t noticed shrinking)
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

review_title: Neck hole is not cut right
reviews: The sweater is alright, thin fabric, but I wouldn't expect anything else for a measly 10 bucks. The reason it gets 2 stars is because the neck inst cut right. The neck hole is very small and makes the sweater look weird af. Not even worth returning due to shipping and the fact it was 10 dollars, so this will go immediately into the value village donations. LOL
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: A name brand sweatshirt at an unbeatable price. I'm 6 feet and 208 lbs and the large fit me perfectly. Very soft fleece on the inside and no shrinkage after washing and drying. Good value for money.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Color is exactly as pictured and I love these sweaters for yoga. I only gave it 4 stars because I am a woman and I usually fit men's XL or large. But the large fits too big for me. So women might want to buy a size or two smaller.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Seriously can’t beat the price. I own 3 of these now. I love the colours and they look so cute with leggings as an oversized sweater. The inside is SO soft and they are VERY warm. Seriously: treat. Your. Self! These rock!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: The sweatshirt fits true to size and the fleece on the inside is quite soft. The material is much thinner than a classic Hanes sweatshirt which should be noted; however, that is a positive to me, and I will likely buy some more in different colours. It's the perfect plain crewneck that should be a staple in everyone's closet.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: The material seems nice although the exterior is not as soft as I was expecting. The interior, however, is quite soft and pleasant to touch. Fit is slightly baggy but as expected, but the wrist elastic/cuff? can be a little bit tight if you're planning on bringing them up to your forearms. 9/10, pretty dope. For sizing reference, I'm 6'ft 150lbs, a good fit would have been a small but I went with a medium so it's slightly baggier. Fits my shoulders well though.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: The quality looks very good and it is super comfortable ! The interior of the sweater is really soft and feel good on the skin. Great style: it is lowkey but remain sylish. It was a little bit smaller than expected but still almost perfect. I'm 6"3 190 lbs and it fits perfectly.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews:
Usually when I get a shirt its either too big or too small but this fit perfectly. Usually with shirts its either too long or too short. This shirt actually fit perfectly. It looks quite good as well. It pairs well with jeans.

I would recommend this to anyone who wears shirts.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I ordered xL because it was the cheaper option in the grey colour and I didn't mind it being oversized. I suspect it may shrink a bit in the wash but if it doesn't I'm fine with it. Super soft and perfect for this light breezy days or fall weather
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: I ordered this sweater to throw on over leggings after yoga or swimming and now I wear it all the time. Since I love it so much, I will be buying another one in a size down for more everyday wear over jeans. My first sweatshirt is a size XL men's, and I am normally a L women's. Lots of room, and it covers lots in our chilly winters. It held up well after a few washes and stays soft. Recommend!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: Excellent excellent excellent, j'en ai acheté 4 et je le recommande à tous. Super qualité, confortable et super prix!!
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt

reviews: A name brand sweatshirt at an unbeatable price. I'm 6 feet and 208 lbs and the large fit me perfectly. Very soft fleece on the inside and no shrinkage after washing and drying. Good value for money.
product_name: Hanes Mens EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt Sweatshirt
